Recent updates in NYC include a deadly e-bike crash highlighting regulatory failures, a construction calamity with no injuries from a high-rise collapse, and new cooling tower regulations following a Legionnaires outbreak, alongside ongoing discussions about housing, education, and public safety amid upcoming weather challenges.
